description:
The 64th GRAMMYs Awards Show, presented by the Recording Academy, is an event honoring “outstanding achievement in the music industry” for the period of time between September 30, 2020, and September 30, 2021. It is scheduled to take place at the MGM Grand Garden Arena in Las Vegas on April 3, 2022. The nominations were announced on November 23, 2021.

This is a market on whether Billie Eilish will win any Grammy for any category at the 64th GRAMMYs Awards Show, scheduled to take place on April 3, 2022. 

If Billie Eilish wins any Grammy at the 64th GRAMMYs Awards Show, this market will resolve to “Yes”. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

If for any reason the winner is not announced by May 1, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

The primary resolution source will be the Grammy website (https://www.grammy.com/artists/billie-eilish/251741) specifically the section titled "64th Annual GRAMMY Awards", however the television broadcast of the awards and other credible reporting may be used.
